survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from homeowners who have installed renewable energy systems to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and recommendations for future improvements.

questions.question_text: Which type of renewable energy system have you installed in your home?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover the most common renewable energy systems. Include an 'Other' option for less common systems.
